page.title: 16Recreation in Hartlepool
page.content: {6.Are there any societies? Yes there are societies for many interests. Apart from those already mentioned above there is a Natural History Society, a Flower Arrangers Club, an Art Club, an Angling Club, and many other sports clubs including sailing. {7.Can I learn anything to improve any {of my skills? }The College of Art provides recreational classes for adults during the daytime in dressmaking, pottery, jewellery, painting, embroidery and photography as well as Art and Design. Some of these classes are held in the evenings too. In the College of Further Education classes are held in hairdressing, business studies, computers and cookery for the retired. Some evening institutes teach crafts in the schools.
